query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 O voi che siete in piccioletta barca, 2 desiderosi d’ascoltar, seguiti 3 dietro al mio legno che cantando varca,
4 tornate a riveder li vostri liti: 5 non vi mettete in pelago, ché forse, 6 perdendo me, rimarreste smarriti.
query.result:
**English:**
1 O you who are in a tiny boat, 2 desiring to listen, follow 3 behind my ship that sails while singing,
4 turn back to see your shores again: 5 do not put out into the open sea, for perhaps, 6 losing me, you would remain lost.
**Malay:**
1 Wahai kamu yang berada di dalam perahu kecil, 2 yang ingin mendengarkan, ikutilah 3 di belakang kapalku yang berlayar sambil bernyanyi,
4 kembalilah untuk melihat pantai kalian lagi: 5 janganlah kalian pergi ke tengah lautan, karena mungkin, 6 kehilangan aku, kalian akan tetap tersesat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 L’acqua ch’io prendo già mai non si corse; 8 Minerva spira, e conducemi Appollo, 9 e nove Muse mi dimostran l’Orse.
query.result:
**English:**
7 The water that I take has never been sailed before; 8 Minerva breathes, and Apollo guides me, 9 and the nine Muses show me the Great Bear.
**Malay:**
7 Air yang kuambil belum pernah dialirkan; 8 Minerva bertiup, dan Apollo menuntunku, 9 dan sembilan Muses menunjukkan kepadaku Bintang Biduk.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Voialtri pochi che drizzaste il collo 11 per tempo al pan de li angeli, del quale 12 vivesi qui ma non sen vien satollo,
13 metter potete ben per l’alto sale 14 vostro navigio, servando mio solco 15 dinanzi a l’acqua che ritorna equale.
query.result:
**English:**
10 You few who have raised your heads 11 in time to the bread of angels, of which 12 you live here but are never fully satisfied,
13 you can set your ship on the high seas, 14 following my furrow 15 before the water returns to its level.
**Malay:**
10 Kamu sekalian yang sedikit yang telah menegakkan lehermu 11 pada waktunya ke roti para malaikat, yang darinya 12 kamu hidup di sini tetapi tidak pernah sepenuhnya puas,
13 kamu dapat benar-benar mengatur bahtera kalian di lautan lepas, 14 mengikuti alurku 15 sebelum air kembali ke permukaannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Que’ glorïosi che passaro al Colco 17 non s’ammiraron come voi farete, 18 quando Iasón vider fatto bifolco.
query.result:
**English:**
16 Those glorious ones who sailed to Colchis 17 did not marvel as you will do, 18 when they saw Jason become a plowman.
**Malay:**
16 Mereka yang mulia yang berlayar ke Colchis 17 tidak heran seperti yang akan kalian lakukan, 18 ketika mereka melihat Jason menjadi seorang petani.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 La concreata e perpetüa sete 20 del deïforme regno cen portava 21 veloci quasi come ’l ciel vedete.
query.result:
**English:**
19 The innate and perpetual thirst 20 of the deformed realm carried us 21 swiftly, almost as fast as you see the sky.
**Malay:**
19 Dahaga yang wujud dan abadi 20 dari kerajaan yang cacat membawa kami 21 dengan cepat, hampir secepat yang Anda lihat di langit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Beatrice in suso, e io in lei guardava; 23 e forse in tanto in quanto un quadrel posa 24 e vola e da la noce si dischiava,
25 giunto mi vidi ove mirabil cosa 26 mi torse il viso a sé; e però quella 27 cui non potea mia cura essere ascosa,
28 volta ver’ me, sì lieta come bella, 29 «Drizza la mente in Dio grata», mi disse, 30 «che n’ha congiunti con la prima stella».
query.result:
**English:**
22 Beatrice above, and I gazed at her; 23 and perhaps in as much time as an arrow rests 24 and flies and frees itself from the bowstring,
25 I saw myself arrived where a marvelous thing 26 turned my face toward itself; and therefore she 27 to whom my desire could not be hidden,
28 turned toward me, as joyful as she was beautiful, 29 "Direct your mind to God in gratitude," she said to me, 30 "who has joined us with the first star."
**Malay:**
22 Beatrice di atas, dan aku menatapnya; 23 dan mungkin dalam waktu yang sama seperti anak panah berhenti 24 dan terbang dan melepaskan diri dari tali busur,
25 aku melihat diriku tiba di mana sesuatu yang luar biasa 26 memalingkan wajahku ke arahnya; dan karena itu dia 27 yang kepadanya keinginanku tidak dapat disembunyikan,
28 berpaling ke arahku, segembira dia cantik, 29 "Arahkan pikiranmu kepada Tuhan dengan rasa syukur," katanya kepadaku, 30 "yang telah menyatukan kita dengan bintang pertama."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Parev’ a me che nube ne coprisse 32 lucida, spessa, solida e pulita, 33 quasi adamante che lo sol ferisse.
query.result:
**English:**
31 It seemed to me that a cloud was covering me, 32 bright, thick, solid, and polished, 33 almost like a diamond that the sun was striking.
**Malay:**
31 Nampaknya bagiku bahwa awan menyelimutiku, 32 terang, tebal, padat, dan berkilau, 33 hampir seperti berlian yang disinari matahari.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Per entro sé l’etterna margarita 35 ne ricevette, com’ acqua recepe 36 raggio di luce permanendo unita.
query.result:
**English:**
34 Within itself the eternal pearl 35 received them, like water receives 36 a ray of light, remaining united.
**Malay:**
34 Di dalam dirinya mutiara abadi 35 menerimanya, seperti air menerima 36 sinar cahaya, tetap bersatu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 S’io era corpo, e qui non si concepe 38 com’ una dimensione altra patio, 39 ch’esser convien se corpo in corpo repe,
40 accender ne dovria più il disio 41 di veder quella essenza in che si vede 42 come nostra natura e Dio s’unio.
query.result:
**English:**
37 If I was a body, and here it is not conceived 38 how another dimension could fit, 39 which must be if body repeats itself in body,
40 it should kindle in us a greater desire 41 to see that essence in which it is seen 42 how our nature and God were united.
**Malay:**
37 Jika aku adalah tubuh, dan di sini tidak dipahami 38 bagaimana dimensi lain bisa muat, 39 yang harus ada jika tubuh berulang dalam tubuh,
40 itu seharusnya menyalakan dalam diri kita keinginan yang lebih besar 41 untuk melihat esensi di mana terlihat 42 bagaimana kodrat kita dan Tuhan bersatu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Lì si vedrà ciò che tenem per fede, 44 non dimostrato, ma fia per sé noto 45 a guisa del ver primo che l’uom crede.
query.result:
**English:**
43 There one will see what we hold by faith, 44 not demonstrated, but will be known in itself 45 like the first truth that man believes.
**Malay:**
43 Di sana akan terlihat apa yang kita pegang dengan iman, 44 tidak dibuktikan, tetapi akan diketahui dengan sendirinya 45 seperti kebenaran pertama yang dipercayai manusia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Io rispuosi: «Madonna, sì devoto 47 com’ esser posso più, ringrazio lui 48 lo qual dal mortal mondo m’ha remoto.
query.result:
**English:**
46 I replied: "Madonna, I am so devoted 47 as I can be, I thank him 48 who has removed me from the mortal world.
**Malay:**
46 Aku menjawab: "Madonna, aku sangat berbakti 47 sebagaimana aku bisa, aku berterima kasih kepadanya 48 yang telah menjauhkanku dari dunia fana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Ma ditemi: che son li segni bui 50 di questo corpo, che là giuso in terra 51 fan di Cain favoleggiare altrui?».
query.result:
**English:**
49 But tell me: what are the dark signs 50 of this body, which down there on earth 51 make others fable about Cain?
**Malay:**
49 Tetapi katakan padaku: apakah tanda-tanda gelap 50 dari tubuh ini, yang di bawah sana di bumi 51 membuat orang lain bercerita tentang Kain?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Ella sorrise alquanto, e poi «S’elli erra 53 l’oppinïon», mi disse, «d’i mortali 54 dove chiave di senso non diserra,
55 certo non ti dovrien punger li strali 56 d’ammirazione omai, poi dietro ai sensi 57 vedi che la ragione ha corte l’ali.
query.result:
**English:**
52 She smiled a little, and then said to me, "If they err 53 in their opinion, the mortals 54 where the key of understanding does not unlock,
55 certainly the arrows of 56 amazement should no longer sting you, since behind the senses 57 you see that reason has clipped its wings.
**Malay:**
52 Dia tersenyum sedikit, dan kemudian berkata kepadaku, "Jika mereka salah 53 dalam pendapat mereka, manusia 54 di mana kunci pemahaman tidak terbuka,
55 tentu saja anak panah 56 kekaguman seharusnya tidak lagi menusukmu, karena di balik indra 57 kamu melihat bahwa akal telah memotong sayapnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Ma dimmi quel che tu da te ne pensi». 59 E io: «Ciò che n’appar qua sù diverso 60 credo che fanno i corpi rari e densi».
query.result:
**English:**
58 But tell me what you think about it yourself." 59 And I: "What appears different to us up here, 60 I believe is caused by the bodies being rare and dense."
**Malay:**
58 Tetapi katakan padaku apa yang kau pikirkan tentang hal itu." 59 Dan aku: "Apa yang tampak berbeda bagi kita di sini, 60 aku percaya disebabkan oleh benda-benda yang renggang dan padat."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Ed ella: «Certo assai vedrai sommerso 62 nel falso il creder tuo, se bene ascolti 63 l’argomentar ch’io li farò avverso.
query.result:
**English:**
61 And she: "You will certainly see your belief 62 submerged in falsehood, if you listen well 63 to the argument that I will make against it.
**Malay:**
61 Dan dia: "Pastilah kamu akan melihat kepercayaanmu 62 tenggelam dalam kepalsuan, jika kamu mendengarkan dengan baik 63 argumen yang akan kubuat untuk menentangnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 La spera ottava vi dimostra molti 65 lumi, li quali e nel quale e nel quanto 66 notar si posson di diversi volti.
query.result:
**English:**
64 The eighth sphere shows you many 65 lights, which can be noted in their quality and quantity 66 with different aspects.
**Malay:**
64 Bulatan kelapan menunjukkan kepada kalian banyak 65 cahaya, yang mana dan di mana dan dalam kuantitas berapa 66 dapat dicatat dengan aspek yang berbeda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Se raro e denso ciò facesser tanto, 68 una sola virtù sarebbe in tutti, 69 più e men distributa e altrettanto.
query.result:
**English:**
67 If the rare and the dense made this so much, 68 there would be only one virtue in all, 69 more and less distributed and just as much.
**Malay:**
67 Jika yang jarang dan yang padat membuat ini begitu banyak, 68 hanya akan ada satu kebaikan dalam semua, 69 lebih dan kurang didistribusikan dan sama banyaknya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Virtù diverse esser convegnon frutti 71 di princìpi formali, e quei, for ch’uno, 72 seguiterieno a tua ragion distrutti.
query.result:
**English:**
70 Diverse virtues must be the fruits 71 of formal principles, and those, because of one, 72 would follow, destroyed by your reasoning.
**Malay:**
70 Berbagai kebajikan mestilah menjadi buah 71 dari prinsip-prinsip formal, dan itu, karena satu, 72 akan mengikuti, hancur oleh alasanmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Ancor, se raro fosse di quel bruno 74 cagion che tu dimandi, o d’oltre in parte 75 fora di sua materia sì digiuno
76 esto pianeto, o, sì come comparte 77 lo grasso e ’l magro un corpo, così questo 78 nel suo volume cangerebbe carte.
query.result:
**English:**
73 Even if the cause of that darkness 74 which you ask about were rare, or partly 75 external,
76 this planet would be so devoid of its matter
77 or, just as a body distributes 78 the fat and the lean, so this planet 79 would change pages in its volume.
**Malay:**
73 Bahkan, jika penyebab kegelapan itu 74 yang kamu tanyakan, atau sebagiannya 75 berada di luar materinya,
76 planet ini akan sangat kosong dari materinya
77 atau, sebagaimana tubuh mendistribusikan 78 lemak dan kurus, maka planet ini 79 akan mengubah halaman-halaman dalam volumenya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Se ’l primo fosse, fora manifesto 80 ne l’eclissi del sol, per trasparere 81 lo lume come in altro raro ingesto.
query.result:
**English:**
79 If the first [medium] were [the cause], it would be evident 80 in the eclipse of the sun, for the light to shine through 81 as in another rare medium.
**Malay:**
79 Jika yang pertama [menjadi penyebab], maka akan nyata 80 dalam gerhana matahari, karena cahaya bersinar menembus 81 seperti dalam medium langka lainnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Questo non è: però è da vedere 83 de l’altro; e s’elli avvien ch’io l’altro cassi, 84 falsificato fia lo tuo parere.
query.result:
**English:**
82 This is not: but it is to be seen 83 of the other; and if it happens that I break the other, 84 your opinion will be falsified.
**Malay:**
82 Ini bukan: tetapi harus dilihat 83 dari yang lain; dan jika terjadi bahwa aku menghancurkan yang lain, 84 pendapatmu akan dipalsukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Or dirai tu ch’el si dimostra tetro 92 ivi lo raggio più che in altre parti, 93 per esser lì refratto più a retro.
query.result:
**English:**
91 Now it will be said that it appears dark 92 there more than in other parts, 93 because the light is refracted there more backward.
**Malay:**
91 Sekarang akan dikatakan bahwa tempat itu tampak gelap 92 di sana cahayanya lebih dari di tempat lain, 93 karena di sana cahayanya dibiaskan lebih ke belakang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Da questa instanza può deliberarti 95 esperïenza, se già mai la provi, 96 ch’esser suol fonte ai rivi di vostr’ arti.
query.result:
**English:**
94 From this instance experience can free you, 95 if ever you try it, 96 which is usually the source of the streams of your arts.
**Malay:**
94 Dari contoh ini pengalaman dapat membebaskanmu, 95 jika engkau pernah mencobanya, 96 yang biasanya merupakan sumber sungai-sungai kesenianmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Tre specchi prenderai; e i due rimovi 98 da te d’un modo, e l’altro, più rimosso, 99 tr’ambo li primi li occhi tuoi ritrovi.
query.result:
**English:**
97 You will take three mirrors; and remove the two 98 from you in one way, and the other, more removed, 99 between the first two your eyes will find.
**Malay:**
97 Engkau akan mengambil tiga cermin; dan singkirkan dua 98 darimu dengan satu cara, dan yang lain, lebih jauh, 99 di antara dua yang pertama matamu akan menemukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Rivolto ad essi, fa che dopo il dosso 101 ti stea un lume che i tre specchi accenda 102 e torni a te da tutti ripercosso.
query.result:
**English:**
100 Turning to them, make sure that after the hill 101 a light awaits you that the three mirrors kindle 102 and returns to you reflected from all.
**Malay:**
100 Berpaling kepada mereka, pastikan bahwa setelah bukit 101 ada cahaya yang menantimu yang dinyalakan oleh ketiga cermin 102 dan kembali kepadamu dipantulkan dari semuanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Ben che nel quanto tanto non si stenda 104 la vista più lontana, lì vedrai 105 come convien ch’igualmente risplenda.
query.result:
**English:**
103 Although the sight does not extend 104 farther in quantity, there you will see 105 how it is fitting that it shine equally.
**Malay:**
103 Meskipun penglihatan tidak memanjang 104 lebih jauh dalam kuantitas, di sana kamu akan melihat 105 bagaimana seharusnya bersinar sama rata.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Or, come ai colpi de li caldi rai 107 de la neve riman nudo il suggetto 108 e dal colore e dal freddo primai,
109 così rimaso te ne l’intelletto 110 voglio informar di luce sì vivace, 111 che ti tremolerà nel suo aspetto.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Now, just as under the blows of the hot rays 107 of the sun the subject remains bare of snow 108 and of its color and of its coldness before,
109 so you remained in your intellect, 110 I want to inform you with such a vivid light, 111 that it will tremble before you in its aspect.
**Malay:**
106 Sekarang, sama seperti di bawah terpaan sinar matahari yang panas 107 salju mencair dan meninggalkan subjeknya yang telanjang 108 dan dari warnanya dan dari dinginnya sebelumnya,
109 begitulah kamu tetap dalam intelekmu, 110 aku ingin memberitahumu dengan cahaya yang begitu terang, 111 yang akan membuatmu gemetar di hadapannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Dentro dal ciel de la divina pace 113 si gira un corpo ne la cui virtute 114 l’esser di tutto suo contento giace.
query.result:
**English:**
112 Within the heaven of divine peace 113 revolves a body in whose virtue 114 the being of all its content lies.
**Malay:**
112 Di dalam syurga kedamaian ilahi 113 berputar sebuah jasad yang dalam kebajikannya 114 keberadaan semua kepuasannya terletak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Lo ciel seguente, c’ha tante vedute, 116 quell’ esser parte per diverse essenze, 117 da lui distratte e da lui contenute.
query.result:
**English:**
115 The following heaven, which has so many aspects, 116 that being is divided into different essences, 117 separated from it and contained by it.
**Malay:**
115 Langit berikutnya, yang memiliki begitu banyak aspek, 116 makhluk itu terbagi menjadi esensi yang berbeda, 117 terpisah darinya dan terkandung di dalamnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Li altri giron per varie differenze 119 le distinzion che dentro da sé hanno 120 dispongono a lor fini e lor semenze.
query.result:
**English:**
118 The other circles, through various differences, 119 the distinctions that they have within themselves 120 dispose their ends and their seeds.
**Malay:**
118 Lingkaran-lingkaran lainnya, melalui berbagai perbedaan, 119 pembedaan-pembedaan yang mereka miliki di dalam diri mereka sendiri 120 mengatur tujuan-tujuan mereka dan benih-benih mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Questi organi del mondo così vanno, 122 come tu vedi omai, di grado in grado, 123 che di sù prendono e di sotto fanno.
query.result:
**English:**
121 These orders of the world proceed thus, 122 as you can see now, from grade to grade, 123 that from above they take and below they make.
**Malay:**
121 Susunan-susunan dunia ini berjalan demikian, 122 seperti yang dapat kamu lihat sekarang, dari tingkat ke tingkat, 123 yang dari atas mereka ambil dan di bawah mereka buat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Riguarda bene omai sì com’ io vado 125 per questo loco al vero che disiri, 126 sì che poi sappi sol tener lo guado.
query.result:
**English:**
124 Now look carefully at how I go 125 through this place to the truth that is desired, 126 so that you may know how to keep to the ford alone.
**Malay:**
124 Perhatikanlah dengan baik sekarang bagaimana aku pergi 125 melalui tempat ini menuju kebenaran yang diinginkan, 126 sehingga nanti kamu tahu bagaimana untuk menjaga arungan sendirian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 E come l’alma dentro a vostra polve 134 per differenti membra e conformate 135 a diverse potenze si risolve,
136 così l’intelligenza sua bontate 137 multiplicata per le stelle spiega, 138 girando sé sovra sua unitate.
query.result:
**English:**
133 And just as the soul within your body 134 through different and conforming members 135 resolves itself into diverse powers,
136 so its intelligence spreads its goodness 137 multiplied through the stars, 138 revolving itself upon its unity.
**Malay:**
133 Dan sebagaimana jiwa di dalam tubuh Anda 134 melalui anggota-anggota yang berbeda dan sesuai 135 menyelesaikan dirinya ke dalam kekuatan-kekuatan yang beragam,
136 demikian pula kecerdasannya menyebarkan kebaikannya 137 yang berlipat ganda melalui bintang-bintang, 138 memutar dirinya di atas kesatuannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Virtù diversa fa diversa lega 140 col prezïoso corpo ch’ella avviva, 141 nel qual, sì come vita in voi, si lega.
query.result:
**English:**
139 Different virtue makes different alloy 140 with the precious body that it enlivens, 141 in which, just as life in you, it is bound.
**Malay:**
139 Kebajikan yang berbeda membuat paduan yang berbeda 140 dengan tubuh yang berharga yang dihidupkannya, 141 di mana, seperti kehidupan di dalam dirimu, ia terikat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 Per la natura lieta onde deriva, 143 la virtù mista per lo corpo luce 144 come letizia per pupilla viva.
query.result:
**English:**
142 Through the joyful nature from which it is derived, 143 the virtue mixed through the body shines 144 like happiness through a lively pupil.
**Malay:**
142 Melalui sifat gembira yang menjadi asal usulnya, 143 kebaikan yang bercampur melalui tubuh bersinar 144 seperti kegembiraan melalui pupil yang hidup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
145 Da essa vien ciò che da luce a luce 146 par differente, non da denso e raro; 147 essa è formal principio che produce,
148 conforme a sua bontà, lo turbo e ’l chiaro».
query.result:
**English:**
145 From it comes that which from light to light 146 appears different, not from dense and rare; 147 it is the formal principle that produces,
148 according to its goodness, the murky and the clear.”
**Malay:**
145 Daripadanya datang apa yang dari cahaya ke cahaya 146 tampak berbeda, bukan dari padat dan jarang; 147 ia adalah prinsip formal yang menghasilkan,
148 sesuai dengan kebaikannya, yang keruh dan yang jernih.”
